Posts.Content: Hello, I had an open RP in 2009 at a VA hospital in Columbia MO. My PSA was <.1 till Jul 2013 and then rose to .2. My wife freaked out and we were off to Mayo clinic in Rochester MN for a 2nd opinion. Everything I have read say's to start RT at .2. Mayo said I should watch PSA and return when it is 1.0 and they will preform a C-11 PET choline scan. I'm not comfortable having IMRT done at the University of Missouri hospital in Columbia. I have a severe panic disorder and have a lot of abdominal cramping/movement. They said they use the RP surgical staples to define the prostate bed. I think I might need calypso or another IMRT. I have no problem with Mayo but don't understand waiting. My wife is looking at other options for treatment, but, we could use some help. Thanks!!!
Posts.Signature: 61, age at diagnosis 57, pre op PSA - 4.4, DRE normal biopsy Jan 2009, Adenocarcinoma involving <10%, Open RP Mar 2009, lymph nodes negative, tumor confined, Seminal vessels and margins negative AJCC stage pT2cN0Mx Gleason 3+4=7, Nerve sparing bad incontinence and ED 4 years out Psa <.1 till Jul 2013 PSA rising to .2 in Jul 2013, PSA .2 Nov 2013
Posts.Title: PSA rising after RP. Don't understand Mayo Clinic 2nd opinion

Posts.Content: Hi Chuck, I saw Dr. Kwon. I was very impressed with Dr. Kwon and the clinic. Thanks
